column1: Web Site|Meet Loretta|On the Issues|Helping You|Newsroom|Contact MeDear Friend –Throughout my tenure in Congress and as a senior member of the House Armed Services Committee, I have fought to ensure our nation's veterans get the benefits they deserve once they return home.
This Saturday, I am proud to host my 11th Annual Orange County Veterans' Fair featuring employment assistance, free health screenings, housing resources and the VA mobile health bus.

WHAT: 11th Annual Orange County Veterans' Fair in Garden GroveWHEN: 9:00am - 1:00pm Saturday, July 12, 2014WHERE: Garden Grove Elks Lodge, 11551 Trask Ave, Garden Grove, 92843For more details or any questions you may have, please call my Garden Grove office at (714) 621-0102.
Very Truly Yours,Loretta SanchezMember of CongressPrivacy Policy|Unsubscribe
